## Pull Request (PR) Checklist

<details>
<summary><b>üìù PR Title Format Guide</b> (click to expand)</summary>

**Please ensure your PR title follows the conventional format:**

```
<type>([scope]): <subject>
```

**Valid Types:** `build`, `chore`, `ci`, `compat`, `docs`, `enh`, `feat`, `fix`, `perf`, `refactor`, `test`, `type`

**Valid Scopes (optional):** `dev`, `data`, `plotting`, `bokeh`, `matplotlib`, `plotly`, `notebook`

**Examples:**

- ‚úÖ `fix(bokeh): correct hover tooltip positioning`
- ‚úÖ `docs: update installation guide`
- ‚ùå `Fix: hover tooltip` (subject shouldn't start with uppercase)

</details>
